trans-unit.source: The event occurs when serializing an exception that contains custom data in security-transparent code.
trans-unit.target: 序列化包含在安全性透明程式碼中的自訂資料的例外狀況時，就會發生的事件。

trans-unit.source: For more information and an example, see the <xref:System.Runtime.Serialization.ISafeSerializationData> class.
trans-unit.target: 如需詳細資訊和範例，請參閱<xref:System.Runtime.Serialization.ISafeSerializationData>類別。</xref:System.Runtime.Serialization.ISafeSerializationData>

trans-unit.source: Stores the state of the exception.
The class or structure that implements the <xref:System.Runtime.Serialization.ISafeSerializationData> allows you to serialize custom data in security-transparent code.
trans-unit.target: 類別或結構實作<xref:System.Runtime.Serialization.ISafeSerializationData>可讓您將自訂安全性透明程式碼中的資料序列化。</xref:System.Runtime.Serialization.ISafeSerializationData>

trans-unit.source: For more information and an example, see the <xref:System.Runtime.Serialization.ISafeSerializationData> class.
trans-unit.target: 如需詳細資訊和範例，請參閱<xref:System.Runtime.Serialization.ISafeSerializationData>類別。</xref:System.Runtime.Serialization.ISafeSerializationData>

trans-unit.source: A state object that is serialized with the instance.
trans-unit.target: 狀態物件序列化的執行個體。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets an object that describes the source and destination of a serialized stream.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定描述的來源和目的地的序列化資料流的物件。

trans-unit.source: For more information and an example, see the <xref:System.Runtime.Serialization.ISafeSerializationData> class.
trans-unit.target: 如需詳細資訊和範例，請參閱<xref:System.Runtime.Serialization.ISafeSerializationData>類別。</xref:System.Runtime.Serialization.ISafeSerializationData>

trans-unit.source: An object that describes the source and destination of a serialized stream.
trans-unit.target: 描述序列化資料流目的地與來源物件。
